logo-text: Korean Language and TOPIK Study Center located in Tashkent
hero-title: Opportunity to study at South Korean universities with up to 100% scholarships
hero-text: We help you achieve TOPIK level 6 in 5 months
hero-text2: Возможность учиться и работать в Южной Корее, достигнув высокого уровня на TOPIK
hero-button: Sign up for a free lesson.
hero-span2: Sign up for the first lesson for free!
fortitle: TOPIK Academy is just right for you if you:
lione: You want to start speaking Korean in a short period of time.
litwo: You want to learn Korean and build your career
lithree: You want to obtain a TOPIK certificate and win a scholarship to prestigious universities in Korea
lifoo: You want to go to South Korea to study and work
lifife: You have an intermediate level of Korean and want to improve it
lisix: You have been studying for many years but still haven't achieved the desired results
result-title: Results of our students up to TOPIK 6:
grant: Opportunity to win up to 100% scholarship at Korean universities
granttext: The South Korean government offers a scholarship program (GKS) that allows international students to receive a 100% full grant and monthly stipend for bachelor's and master's programs in Korea, administered by the National Institute for International Education of Korea
innertitle: What does the GKS scholarship offer you?
grantdescone: At the beginning and end of the program, travel expenses to Korea and back are covered
grantdesctwo: A one-time payment for accommodation is provided upon arrival in Korea. The amount is 200,000 KRW (approximately 157 USD)
grantdescthree: Language courses and university tuition fees are fully covered (only for master's and doctoral students)... more information
vedeoDedsc: Learn all about the GKS grant in our video interview prepared just for you! ...
succes-title: We assist our successful graduates in choosing a university and winning grants
succes-text: The TOPIK academy consulting team will assist you closely in choosing a university, obtaining a visa, and winning grants
succes-desc: Sign up for a free consultation to get more information!
kurs-title: Sign up for a course that suits you
kurs1-desc: An intensive course for those who want to deeply master the Korean language, 6 days a week for 1.5 hours
kurs2-desc: Standard Korean language classes consisting of 1.5 hours, 3 days a week
kurs3-desc: For those who want to take individual lessons from a teacher, classes of 1.5 hours, 3 days a week. Flexible schedule and personalized approach
description1: Experienced teachers with over 4 years of experience and TOPIK Level 6 will teach you.
description2: We have free coworking spaces for convenient study, networking, and working on your own.
description3: The TOPIK academy team regularly organizes additional events for students.
description4: Participate in trial exams held during the course to track your progress and level.
description5: If you have difficulties with the course material, a curator will be available to assist you.
description6: We assist our successful graduates in obtaining a visa for studying in South Korea, choosing a university, and securing scholarships
question1: Do you provide study materials or do I need to find them myself?
answer1: We provide all the study materials.
question2: In what format are the lessons conducted?
answer2: Lessons are conducted online and in video format.
answer3: You need to fill out the form on our website to register.
questonttwo-title: Do you have any questions left?
questonttwo-text: Leave your information, and we will contact you to answer all your questions
